content:
German sausages have a variety of spices and seasonings, depending on the type of sausage. However, some common spices and herbs used in German sausages include:

* Allspice
* Caraway seeds
* Coriander
* Garlic powder
* Marjoram
* Mustard seed
* Nutmeg
* Paprika
* Pepper
* Salt

Some German sausages also include beer, wine, or vinegar for additional flavor. Different types of sausages have different seasoning blends, so the specific spices used may vary depending on the sausage recipe.
